content: --मर्याद {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} boundless, immeasurable. {2} transgressing the limits of right or propriety, unrestrained, unruly, sinful, criminal; मनुजपशुभिर्निर्मर्यादैर्भवद्भिरुदायुधैः <ls>Ve. 3. 22.</ls> {3} confused. {4} insolent, immodest. (--दं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} confusedly, topsy-turvy. (--दं confusion, disorder.
